entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A further 1 to 3 cm may accumulate on higher parts of the road until late afternoon with lesser amounts down to 800 metres. Snow is then expected to turn to rain for a time this evening, but snow showers return overnight and Saturday morning when another 1 to 3 cm may accumulate on the road above 800 metres.
